name: Light Shaft LDJAM41
description:
Created for Ludum Dare 41

A game by Helfter "0uicmoi" Victor, Nicol Kilian, "Kaillens" and Camps "Tyrod" Maxime.

How to play :

Light Shafts is a platformer/card game. You need to get to the top of the level as fast as possible, using standard platformer movement but also a set of cards.
Cards allows you to place different platforms in the world. Be careful, you don’t have an unlimited amount of them in your deck! You can only place object on hooks or (relatively) near preexisting platforms. And, when the timer runs out, it isn’t a game over but you won’t draw cards anymore (although you can still use those in your hand). If you can’t reach the end because you ran out of cards, hit the reset button!
Once you’ve used a card, it won’t come back, but discarded one will, eventually.

Controls : Jump/Go up ladder : w, up arrow key
Go down ladder :  s; down arrow key
Go left : a, left arrow key
Go right : d, right arrow key
Free view : hold ctrl or alt and move mouse
Activate card/place object : left mouse
Discard card/cancel placement : right mouse
View deck or discard pile :  left mouse on it
Open menu : Tab
